Title: Hill 24 Doesn't Answer
Writer: Zvi Kolitz (story and screenplay), Peter Frye (screenplay)
Actors: Edward Mulhare, Haya Harareet, Michael Shillo, Michael Wager
Plot: This was the first movie produced in Israel. It deals with the outbreak of hostilities during the war for independence in 1947. The message of this film was the sadness and stupidity of people killing each other and how "it's always the old who lead us to war and only the young who die..." (Phil Ochs)
